Production.ScrapReason.description: Lookup table containing reasons why a product was scrapped during manufacturing.

HumanResources.Shift.description: Work shift lookup table (e.g., Day, Evening, Night).

Production.ProductCategory.description: High-level classification of products (e.g., Bikes, Accessories).

Purchasing.ShipMethod.description: Shipping methods used for orders (e.g., Cargo, Express).

Production.ProductCostHistory.description: Historical record of product standard costs over time.

Sales.ShoppingCartItem.description: Items currently in customer online shopping carts.

Production.ProductDocument.description: Cross-reference table linking products to technical documentation.

dbo.DatabaseLog.description: Audit log recording DDL (Data Definition Language) changes and database events.

Production.ProductInventory.description: Inventory levels, including bin and shelf locations, for products at various locations.

dbo.ErrorLog.description: Log of errors encountered in the database.

Production.ProductListPriceHistory.description: Historical record of product list prices over time.

Person.Address.description: Street addresses for customers, employees, and vendors.

Sales.SpecialOfferProduct.description: Cross-reference table linking products to specific special offers.

Production.ProductModel.description: Groups products into models for cataloging and instructions.

Person.AddressType.description: Lookup table for address categories (e.g., Billing, Home, Shipping).

Person.StateProvince.description: State and province lookup table linked to country regions.

Production.ProductModelIllustration.description: Links product models to diagrams and illustrations.

dbo.AWBuildVersion.description: Current database version and build information.

Production.ProductModelProductDescriptio.description: Links product models to descriptions in specific languages (Cultures).

Production.BillOfMaterials.description: Defines the assembly hierarchy and components for manufactured products.

Sales.Store.description: Customers who are retail stores, including demographic data.

Production.ProductProductPhoto.description: Cross-reference table linking products to one or more photos.

Production.TransactionHistory.description: Record of all product inventory transactions.

Production.ProductReview.description: Customer ratings and reviews for products.

Person.BusinessEntity.description: Base table for all individuals and organizations (People, Vendors, Stores).

Production.TransactionHistoryArchive.description: Archived inventory transactions for historical analysis.

Person.BusinessEntityAddress.description: Links business entities (people/stores) to their addresses.

Purchasing.ProductVendor.description: Cross-reference table linking products to the vendors who supply them.

Person.BusinessEntityContact.description: Links business entities (like stores) to specific people as contacts.

Production.UnitMeasure.description: Lookup table for units of measurement (e.g., KG, EA).

Purchasing.Vendor.description: Information about companies that provide parts or products.

Person.ContactType.description: Lookup table for contact roles (e.g., Owner, Sales Manager).

Sales.CountryRegionCurrency.description: Links countries/regions to their primary currency.

Purchasing.PurchaseOrderDetail.description: Individual line items for vendor purchase orders.

Production.Culture.description: Language and regional settings for localized data.

Production.WorkOrderRouting.description: Sequence of manufacturing steps for a work order.

Purchasing.PurchaseOrderHeader.description: General information for vendor purchase orders.

Sales.Customer.description: Information about customers (can be individuals or stores).

Sales.SalesOrderDetail.description: Individual line items for customer sales orders.

HumanResources.Employee.description: Internal employee data including job titles and hire dates.

Sales.SalesOrderHeader.description: General information for customer sales orders.

HumanResources.EmployeeDepartmentHistory.description: Tracks employee movements between departments and shifts.

HumanResources.EmployeePayHistory.description: Tracks employee salary and wage changes.

Sales.SalesOrderHeaderSalesReason.description: Links sales orders to the reasons they were placed.

Production.Illustration.description: Product diagrams and illustrations in XML format.

HumanResources.JobCandidate.description: Resumes and details for potential job hires.

Person.Password.description: Hashed passwords and salts for user accounts.

Sales.SalesPersonQuotaHistory.description: Historical records of sales quotas for sales staff.

Person.Person.description: General personal information for individuals (employees, customers, etc.).

Sales.SalesReason.description: Lookup table for why customers purchase products (e.g., price, review).

Sales.SalesTaxRate.description: Tax rates for specific state or province regions.

Sales.PersonCreditCard.description: Links individuals to their credit cards.

Sales.SalesTerritory.description: Sales regions and their performance data.

Person.PhoneNumberType.description: Lookup table for phone number types (e.g., Cell, Home).

Production.Product.description: Central catalog for all items manufactured, purchased, or sold.

Sales.SalesTerritoryHistory.description: Tracks sales representatives' movements across territories.
